teacher_info.intro:
Меня зовут Жанна. 
Я из России и живу в Сибири в городе Тюмень. Мне 36 лет. Русский - мой родной язык. Я работала преподавателем несколько лет и учила подростков различным предметам в колледже. Уже пять лет  я изучаю английский язык и в процессе изучения я поняла, что преподавание языков - это та сфера, в которой я могу быть наиболее полезна. 
Люблю смотреть старое классическое кино (американское, русское, итальянское, французское), современные сериалы и концерты русских и западных стенд-ап комиков. Обожаю готовить для себя и своих близких. В свободное время катаюсь на самокате с членами свой семьи, а так же очень люблю долгие пешие прогулки. Очень люблю животных, особенно лошадей.
teacher_info.about_me:
Меня зовут Жанна. 
Я из России и живу в Сибири в городе Тюмень. Мне 36 лет. Русский - мой родной язык. Я работала преподавателем несколько лет и учила подростков различным предметам в колледже. Уже пять лет  я изучаю английский язык и в процессе изучения я поняла, что преподавание языков - это та сфера, в которой я могу быть наиболее полезна. 
Люблю смотреть старое классическое кино (американское, русское, итальянское, французское), современные сериалы и концерты русских и западных стенд-ап комиков. Обожаю готовить для себя и своих близких. В свободное время катаюсь на самокате с членами свой семьи, а так же очень люблю долгие пешие прогулки. Очень люблю животных, особенно лошадей.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Я уже более года даю индивидуальные занятия по русскому языку. Я верю, что лучший способ обучение языку - это обучение через общение и хочу помочь вам развить ваши языковые навыки через интересную беседу. Я помогу вам преодолеть сложности на пути изучения русского языка. Терпеливо и заботливо объясню, все тонкости русского языка и постараюсь поддержать вас в вашем стремлении к новым знаниям. Буду рада видеть вас на своих занятиях.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Моей целью является найти индивидуальный подход к каждому ученику, отталкиваясь от уровня его знаний и его целей. 
На занятиях с моими учениками мы будем развивать разговорную речь через обсуждение широкого спектра тем, разбирать грамматику, увеличивать словарный запас, через применение новых слов,фраз и речевых оборотов. 
Я стараюсь сделать свои занятия максимально интерактивными, вовлекать ученика в обсуждение, как повседневных, так и более специализированных тем. Разбирать каждый интересный ученику речевой оборот,идиому или метафору, применяемые в русском языке.

course_info.trial_description:
This Russian lesson is for anyone who wants to improve their confidence in Russian.
During this lesson, we will get to know you and determine the direction of our further classes.

pro_course_detail.title: INFORMAL TUTORING
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is for anyone who want to improve the level of confidence in Russian language.
During our conversation lesson, I will ask a lot of interesting questions about differernt topics.
It can include:  hobbies, pets, family, television, impressions, shopping, travel and plenty others.
If you have any specific topic that interests you, let me know and I will prepare a basic structure for our conversation.

pro_course_detail.title: GENERAL RUSSIAN COURSE
pro_course_detail.description:
I can help you learn the Russian alphabet, basic Russian phrases, rules of spelling and support you with reading. 
Also I can help you to get rid of common pronunciation mistakes.

Я могу помочь вам в изучении русского алфавита, выучить основные русские фразы, правила орфографии и научить вас читать. Также я могу помочь вам избавиться от типичных ошибок произношения.

teacher_info.intro:
I'm a native Russian speaker from Moscow with 5+ years of teaching experience, both in person and online. I currently study Chinese language and culture at the Higher School of Economics. 

I run a YouTube channel with over 100,000+ subscribers about learning English. The channel is just my name, "Veronika Mark." Go check it out! I hope it will help you :)

I love doing sports, especially gymnastics, yoga, and track & field. I'm also very interested in cooking, nutrition, and veganism, so let me know if you want to talk about those topics!

I love learning languages and speak English and Russian fluently. Still working on my French and Chinese :)
teacher_info.short_signature: English teaching YouTuber with 5+ years of experience
teacher_info.about_me:
I'm a native Russian speaker from Moscow with 5+ years of teaching experience, both in person and online. I currently study Chinese language and culture at the Higher School of Economics. 

I run a YouTube channel with over 100,000+ subscribers about learning English. The channel is just my name, "Veronika Mark." Go check it out! I hope it will help you :)

I love doing sports, especially gymnastics, yoga, and track & field. I'm also very interested in cooking, nutrition, and veganism, so let me know if you want to talk about those topics!

I love learning languages and speak English and Russian fluently. Still working on my French and Chinese :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have taught English in Russia for 5+ years. I have also taught Russian to foreigners for over three years.

Like any good teacher, I adjust according to YOUR needs and interests. I believe that lessons should focus on your goals. At our first lesson, we will talk about what you want to achieve.

I am very thorough about lesson preparation. If you want homework, I'll give you homework. If you want to watch videos, I will find videos for you. I want to help you find material that you will enjoy so that learning languages will be satisfying for you!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
We will first learn about your goals and then identify your language level. This happens at the first lesson.

I enjoy using modern methods like videos, images, and GIFs, but I can change this based on your needs. I recommend Anki/flashcard tools for students that need them. I can also teach you how to set those up well. (I have a video about this on my YouTube channel).

For each lesson, I prepare topics that relate to current events or your personal interests. I use materials related to those topics. If we're talking about politics, for example, we can watch a news clip together -- that's how we make learning English engaging!

course_info.trial_description:
你好！Привет! Hi, and thank you for choosing to book a trial lesson with me! 

What is a trial lesson for? It's for me to learn more about you, your current level, and what you want to accomplish. It's also for you to meet me and to understand if I am the correct teacher for you (because there ARE teachers that may or may not suit you!)

We will practice grammar and hone our speaking skills, but in a conversational manner. There won't be any deep explanations of grammar or vocabulary; we will cover that when we can spend more than thirty minutes together.

I'm looking forward to meeting you!

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring: RUSSIAN
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is great for everyone who wants to improve their speaking skills in Russian. I will help you understand Russian grammar and explain all the difficulties of the Russian language. 

As a foreign language tutor, I am always extremely flexible. I usually use those material that my students find the most interesting and useful. We can read Russian classics, listen to Russian classical and pop music and watch clips from old school Russian movies. Homework is optional but not necessary.

This lesson type is suitable for all age groups.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring: ENGLISH
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is great for everyone who wants to improve their speaking skills in English. I will help you understand English grammar and explain all the difficulties of the American accent. 

As a foreign language tutor, I am always extremely flexible. I usually use those material that my students find the most interesting and useful. We can read English classics, listen to American pop music and watch movies. Homework is optional but not necessary.

This lesson type is suitable for all age groups.

teacher_info.intro:
Привет! Меня зовут Ирина. Я живу в Москве. Я закончила университет по специальности Востоковедение. Я люблю изучать иностранные языки, говорю на английском и китайском, но не перестаю улучшать свой уровень. Я очень люблю общаться с новыми людьми и просто обожаю узнавать об особенностях и культуре других стран.

   Hi! My name is Irina. I live in Moscow.  I graduated from the University with a degree in Eastern Studies. I love learning languages, I speak English and Chinese and I constantly improve my skills. I like meeting new people and discover different cultures.

   你好！我叫爱林。我住在莫斯科。我从大学毕业了，我的专业是东方学。我会说英语与中文，更多，我喜欢学习外国语，所以不住手地提高那些语言水平。 我真的很喜欢与新人沟通，特别对它国的特色和文化感兴趣。
teacher_info.short_signature: Со мной вы полюбите русский язык :)

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Уже год я преподаю на italki, поэтому у меня уже есть опыт работы с иностранными студентами и свои методы. Я стараюсь делать уроки максимально интересными и подстраиваюсь под каждого ученика. Я терпеливая и всегда готова помочь. Мои уроки очень динамичные и я не дам вам заскучать :)

   It's been a yer since I teach on italki, I have some experience now and some working methods. I'm trying to make my lessons really interesting and fit the needs of the student. I'm very patient and always ready to help. My lessons are very dynamic and I will not let you get bored :)


   我已经在 italki 任教一年了，所以我已经有了与外国学生打交道的经验和我自己的方法。我试图让课程尽可能有趣，并适应每个学生。我很有耐心，随时准备提供帮助。我的课程很有活力，我不会让你感到无聊:)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
🌸Я не преподаю детям 🌸I don't teach children 🌸
   Самое главное на моих уроках- это разговорная практика. Большую часть урока мы будем говорить. Да, даже если вы начинающий :) Я не люблю большое количество одинаковых грамматических упражнений, поэтому каждое новое правило мы будем сразу применять на практике. 

   The most important part of my lessons is conversational practice. We will be talking most of the lesson. Yes, even if you are a beginner :) I don't like a numerous identical grammar exercises, instead we will immediately apply each new rule in practice. 

   在我的课程中，最重要的是会话练习。我们将在本课的大部分内容中进行讨论。是的，即使您是初学者 :) 我不喜欢大量相同的语法练习，我们会立即将每条新规则应用到实践中。

course_info.trial_description:
Trial lesson is very important for both of us. This will be a relaxed and fun 30 minutes for us to talk about your language learning goals and to decide which direction you might like to take in the future. I will ask you questions to get to know you and also tell you about myself. 

Пробный урок очень важен для нас обоих. Это будут расслабленные и весёлые 30 минут, за которые мы обсудим ваши цели и определим, в каком направлении нам нужно будет двигаться. Я буду задавать вам вопросы, чтобы узнать вас ближе а также расскажу о себе.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice
pro_course_detail.description:
🌸Only for elementary+ students, not for beginners🌸

   Выберите этот тип урока если вы хотите практиковаться в разговорной речи. Мы можем обсудить любую тему, которая кажется вам интересной. С удовольствием послушаю про ваши любимые сериалы\фильмы\книги или поделюсь своими. Я не сомневаюсь, что мы сможем найти тему, которая будет нравится нам двоим. Я научу вас новым словам, отвечу на ваши вопросы и буду вас исправлять чтобы сделать вашу разговорную речь более естественной.

   Choose this lesson type if you would like to have a conversational practice. Any topics can be discussed as long as you find them fun and interesting. I would like to hear about your favourite TV series\movies\books or share my own :) I have no doubt we'll find a topic that we can both enjoy. Learn common phrases, ask questions and get corrections to make your speech sound more natural.

   如果您想练习口语，请选择此课程类型。我们可以讨论您觉得有趣的任何话题。我很想听听你最喜欢的系列/电影/书籍或分享我自己的。我毫不怀疑我们可以找到一个我们都喜欢的主题。我会教你生词，回答你的问题并纠正你，让你的谈话更自然。

pro_course_detail.title: ✨New✨ Russian for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
🌸Я не преподаю детям 🌸I don't teach children 🌸

  Этот урок для тех, кто хочет начать изучать русский язык. На уроках я буду использовать учебник, картинки и дополнительные материалы. Но основная часть урока- применение новых слов и правил на практике. Мы начнём говорить на русском с самого первого урока :) 

   This lesson is for those who want to start learning Russian. At the lessons I will use the textbook, pictures and additional materials. The main part of the lesson is using of new words and rules in practice. We will start speaking Russian from the very first lesson :)

   本课适合那些想开始学习俄语的人。在课程中，我将使用教科书、图片和其他材料。课程的主要部分是在实践中应用新单词和规则。我们将从第一课开始说俄语  :)

teacher_info.about_teacher:
En mis clases uso el método comunicativo. Soy amable con mis alumnos y sé crear un ambiente agradable pero al mismo tiempo de trabajo para que el alumno pueda conseguir sus objetivos. 
На уроках я использую коммуникативный подход. Могу создать дружелюбную, но в тоже время рабочую атмосферу для того, чтобы ученик достиг поставленных целей. 
I use the communicative approach in my lessons. I know how to create a friendly atmosphere which would be good for productive work in order that the student reach his or her goals.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Mis clases son para los alumnos que quieren ampliar su vocabulario y practicar la conversación. Trabajo a base de manuales de ELE (español) y vídeos y textos (ruso, español). He elaborado un método que me permite convertirlos en material didáctico. 
Мои уроки рассчитаны на тех, кто хочет расширить словарный запас и приобрести уверенность в разговорной речи. Я работаю на основе учебников (испанский) и видео и текстов (испанский, русский). У меня разработан метод адаптации этих материалов для использования на уроке. 
My lessons are for students who want to broaden their vocabulary. I work with coursebooks (Spanish) or texts and videos (Russian, Spanish) that I convert into didactic materials.

course_info.trial_description:
During the trial lesson I will explain you the plan of my lessons aimed at expanding your vocabulary and will answer your questions. We can also have a short lesson based on a text for you to see what to expect from the lessons. 

Durante la lección de prueba explicaré la dinamica de mis clases dirigidas a enriquecer tu vocabulario y contestaré a tus preguntas. También podemos hacer una breve lección basada en un texto para que veas cómo van a ser las clases. 

Во время пробного урока я объясню структуру моих уроков, направленных на расширение вашего словарного запаса, и отвечу на вопросы. Также мы можем провести сокращенный урок на основе текста для того, чтобы вы могли понять, как будут проходить уроки.

pro_course_detail.title: Gramática y vocabulario del español / Грамматика и словарный запас испанского / Spanish grammar and vocabulary
pro_course_detail.description:
- На этих уроках за основу берутся тексты или видео на разные темы. До урока вы получаете текст или видео (на более высоких уровнях) для того чтобы подготовиться к уроку заранее. На уроке мы обсудим тему текста/видео, проработаем лексику, а затем снова вернемся к обсуждению для того, чтобы вы могли использовать новую лексику.
- Если у вас нулевой или начинающий уровень (0-А1), то мы можем использовать учебник как основу для уроков, а также дополнительные материалы. Лексический компонент уроков сохраняется.
- Также возможно использовать учебник на уровнях А2-В2.

- En estas clases vamos a trabajar a base de textos y vídeos de temas diferentes. Antes de cada clase vas a recibir un texto o un vídeo (en los niveles más altos) para que lo puedas leer o ver antes de la clase. En clase hablaremos del tema del texto/vídeo, haremos ejercicios para trabajar el vocabulario del texto/vídeo y a continuación podrás usar este nuevo léxico para contestar las preguntas sobre el texto/vídeo o para hablar de tus propias experiencias.  
- Para el nivel principiante (0-A1), podemos utilizar un libro como guía, más los materiales complementarios. El componente léxico de las clases se conserva. 
- También es posible utilizar un manual de ELE para los niveles A2-B2.

pro_course_detail.title: Let´s speak Russian / Поговорим по-русски / Hablemos en ruso
pro_course_detail.description:
Conversation lessons for students with A2-C2 levels. No grammar. 
On these lessons we are going to work with texts and videos about different topics. Before every lesson you will receive a text or a video to prepare for the lesson. During the lesson we will discuss the general topic of the text/video, work with its vocabulary and then continue to discuss the text/video contents in order you could use the new vocabulary.   

Разговорные уроки для студентов с уровнями А2-С2. Без грамматики. 
На уроках за основу берутся тексты или видео на разные темы. До урока вы получаете текст или видео для того чтобы подготовиться к уроку заранее. На уроке мы обсудим тему текста/видео, проработаем лексику, а затем перейдем к обсуждению содержания текста/видео для того, чтобы вы могли использовать новую лексику.

Clases de conversación para los estudiantes con los niveles A2-C2. Sin gramática.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian language marathon
pro_course_detail.description:
I invite you to my first Russian language marathon. During this marathon we`ll:
1) do a lot of exercises 
2) speak
3) communicate with people the same level 

The topic of the marathon is Home Sweet Home. 
What is the goal of the marathon? The main goal is to tell about a place where you live, about the rooms in your house/flat, furniture, what people do in these rooms. Also we`ll talk about some cases and prepositions of place.
What will we do?
Every day I`ll send you some exercises to do. You do it whenever you want and wherever you want. You send it to me, I`ll check everything and give you feedback, correct mistakes, or give an extra exercise for more practicing.
We`ll also have some exercises for speaking, listening, writing and reading. All materials will be yours forever.

If you want to take part in this marathon, write me "Marathon". 
All the information about dates and worksheets will be late.
The number of participants is limited.
The cost of the marathon is 15 dollars

course_info.trial_description:

2) Мы приблизительно определим твой текущий уровень языка и выявим проблемные области, над которыми мы будем работать на следующих занятиях
3) мы поговорим о твоих целях и задачах в изучении языка и выберем подходящий план занятий

Если твой уровень уже достаточно высок, то:
1) познакомимся друг с другом получше, отвечая на интересные вопросы.
2) начнём обсуждать интересные русские обычаи.

Hello, dear friend! On the first trial lesson we will:
1) Get to know each other (or you will learn how to introduce yourself and how to greet in Russian)
2) We will apporximately define your current level of Russian language and figure out which problematic areas of the language we should work on
3) We will talk about your tasks and goals to prepare your individual learning plan and schedule

If your level is already high, we will:
1) ask each other interesting questins to get to know each other better
2) start discussing interesting russian traditions

pro_course_detail.title: First Steps - Fundamental Russian for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's get started with the basics you need to be able to use and understand Russian!
 
During this course you will learn:
- how to pronounce russian sounds, letters and words properly
-  how to recognize written words and slow speech
- to use BASIC PHRASES in your daily life
- use basic grammar structures

Studying intensively, it's possible to cover all these topics in less than 3 months (around 60 classes depending on your progress)!

After finishing the course you'll have fundamental knowledge of Russian basics which is enough for continuing learning the language. Also, you'll be able to use simple words and phrases in your daily life.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian Course: Road to Russian Fluency (B1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for those, who has already got some knowledge of Russian language and would like to continue learning, throwing yourself deep into the language. 

In this course we will:
- correct your pronunciation properly if you have any problems
- work on your intonation
- practice your spelling and speech recognition though various dictations (if you need it)
- expand your vocabulary through speaking, reading and listening
- learn more complex useful phrases necessary for daily life to better expresss yourself
-  get into Russian grammar with various templates (patterns) and excercises

Also you will:
- learn how to save money and make friends here in Russia
- learn about Russian culture from traditional customs, holidays and historical stories and become a Russian expert
-go through such important topics as booking hotels, buying tickets, ordering food, asking for directions, greeting, shopping, phone calls and messages, renting an apartment, going to the doctor and so on.

Don't worry! On our classes we will communicate and put your knowledge into practice as well, so you can be not only accurate, but also fluent!

After finishing with this course you will be able to use Russian language confidently and get the solid understanding of it's basic structure, which is enough to continue learning it by yourself.

pro_course_detail.title: Let's Talk in Russian! (Conversational Informal Russian)
pro_course_detail.description:
Дорогие друзья! Этот урок направлен на то, чтобы вы, с моей помощью, расширили свой словарный запас, кругозор, а также научились уверенно общаться на русском языке на любую тему!
Сначала мы познакомимся друг с другом. На первых уроках я буду задавать вопросы различного уровня сложности для ведения интересных дискуссий.

Затем, структура занятия будет следующая:
1) Вы предлагаете тему урока, например, путешествия
2) Вместе мы выбираем несколько интересных текстов или видео для обсуждения
3) На уроке мы знакомимся с выбранным текстом (видео), читаем
4) Я объясняю значения новых слов и выражений (если такие есть)
5) Я задаю вопросы по тексту (видео), на которые вы должны дать ответ
6) После чего мы обсуждаем новую информацию и делимся впечатлениями

С каждым новым уроком вы будете совершать всё меньше ошибок, обретете уверенность в общении и пополните свой словарный запас. 

Dear friends! The purpose of this lesson is for you, with my help, to correct your mistakes and increase your vocabulary and get more confidence in speaking on any topic

On the first series of lessons we'll get to know each other better. I will ask you various questions, starting from simple and getting to more complex interesting discussions. 

Then, our typical lesson will look like this:
1) You suggest a topic you are interested in
2) We try to find various materials on this topic (videos or texts)
3) First we get familiarized with the materials, read them aloud and watch them
4) we pause if you stumble upon any new words, so I can explain their meaning to you and help you to remember them
5) I ask you different questions on the material
6) We discuss the material, sharing our conclusions and points of view

With every lesson you will increase your vocabulary, make less mistakes and speak more confidently!

pro_course_detail.title: АНГЛИЙСКИЙ для Русскоговорящих (English for Russian speakers)
pro_course_detail.description:
Вы только недавно начали изучать английский язык или забыли всё то, что проходили в школе, и хотите основательно взяться за его изучение?
Тогда добро пожаловать ко мне на урок!

На данном курсе мы будем как прорабатывать произношение, так и проходить ключевые грамматические темы по порядку, а также пополнять словарный запас полезными разговорными фразами и выражениями.

Особенности занятий со мной: 
- использование ассоциаций для эффективного запоминания новых слов
- использование шаблонных грамматических конструкций для их эффективного запоминания
- использование специальных программ для эффективного повторения запомненного
- активное применение знаний на практике после их изучения

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный АНГЛИЙСКИЙ (Conversational English Practice)
pro_course_detail.description:
Давай вместе поговорим и обсудим различные интересные новости, темы и материалы (статьи и видео) на английском языке!
Ты можешь выбрать как собственную тему для обсуждения, так и положиться на мою собственную инициативу!
Я буду исправлять ваши ошибки по мере возможности, однако основная задача данного занятия это прежде всего - выражение своих мыслей и общение на английском языке.

pro_course_detail.title: Подготовка к тестам ТРКИ (TORFL test preparation)
Деловой Русский (Business Russian)
pro_course_detail.description:
Мои уроки делового русского подходят вам если:
1) У вас есть чёткая цель и позиция и вы желаете достичь определённого результата.
2) Перед вами стоит определённая задача, с которой вам необходимо справиться.
3) Вы готовитесь к презентации, переговорам или докладу на русском языке.

На моих уроках мы будем:
1) Изучать лексику, необходимую для выполнения задачи (в том числе профессиональную лексику).
2) Работать над проблемными грамматическими темами.
3) Анализировать похожие работы и ситуации.
4) Готовиться непосредственно к выполнению самой задачи (презентация, переговоры).
--------------------------------------------------
My business Russian lessons suit your needs if:
1) You have a clear goal and position and you want to achieve a certain result.
2) You are faced with a specific task that you need to cope with.
3) You are preparing for a presentation, report or negotiations in Russian.

On my lessons we will:
1) Learn the vocabulary necessary to complete the task (including professional vocabulary).
2) Work on problematic grammatical topics.
3) Analyze similar works and situations.
4) Prepare for the task itself (presentation, report, negotiations).

pro_course_detail.title: АНГЛИЙСКИЙ для ДЕТЕЙ / ENGLISH for CHILDREN
pro_course_detail.description:
I have a great experience of teaching children of various levels and ages, both online and offline.
1) Firstly, we will get to know each other with your child, figure out their current level of English.
2) We will choose the materials depending on their age, level and interests.
3) Then we will study in a fun and interesting way using various exercises, songs, videos and arts.
As a result children will want to learn English more and more with every class, and they progress quickly!
---------------------------------
У меня имеется опыт обучения детей разного уровня и возраста как онлайн, так и офлайн.
1) Во-первых, мы познакомимся с вашим ребенком, выясним его текущий уровень английского языка.
2) Подберем материалы в зависимости от возраста, уровня и интересов.
3) Затем мы будем учиться весело и интересно, используя различные упражнения, песни, видео и поделки.
В результате, с каждым уроком, дети хотят изучать английский язык все больше и больше, и их прогресс быстро растёт!

pro_course_detail.title: РУССКИЙ для ДЕТЕЙ / RUSSIAN for CHILDREN
pro_course_detail.description:
I have experience of teaching children of various levels and ages, both online and offline.
1) Firstly, we will get to know each other with your child, figure out their current level of Russian.

pro_course_detail.title: Critical thinking and writing
pro_course_detail.description:
Critical Thinking and Writing is a combination of business Russian, language for special purposes, and the practice of argumentation.

During the lessons we learn to
- read big Russian texts in 4 blocks "Technical world", "Man and Nature", "Man and Society", "Man and Art ".
We take well-known problematic topics such as Benefits and Harm from Unmanned Vehicles, Employment of a Young Mother, Top professions of the future, etc.
- separate the main information from the secondary
- make plans of texts for retelling
- ask the questions right
- distinguish fake from the truth
- argument own position correctly
- distinguish rational and irrational arguments
- participate in discussions, express their opinion
- write essays
- use Russian-language search services such as Google and Yandex

This course is for you if you 
- want to learn
- read large texts,
- behave adequately in scientific and everyday discourse,
- argument  your position 
- improve your speaking skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian from scratch
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course I will introduce you to the Russian alphabet through international and borrowed words and mnemonics, so you will learn it easily and will be able to read quickly. Don't be afraid of Cyrillic characters! You will also learn basic vocabulary, some grammar structures and essential phrases. 
The course consits of 4 or 5 lessons depending on the duration of the session. If you buy a package and learn everything in less than 5 lessons we will continue with another course.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for bilingual kids
pro_course_detail.description:
Уроки русского для детей русскоговорящих родителей, живущих не в русскоязычных странах.

These classes will help your child not to forget Russian in another country and improve their conversational and reading skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Exam Preparation Course (TORFL)
pro_course_detail.description:
The preparation includes the diagnostics of your current level and the consultation on the exam structure if needed.

In this course, we will work on closing your knowledge gaps, focus on the specific tasks and the best way to do them, practice in doing sample tests. I leave time consuming tasks for homework and correct them outside lesson time.

Throughout class I'll be sending you detailed language feedback and notes, both corrections and suggestions based on your own personal mistakes to improve your answers according to the TORFL assessment criteria.

I understand how important the examination is for a student and trying to do my best to make them feel well-prepared and confident to take the test.

You can choose the specific part of the examination (eg. Speaking or Writing) to prepare  for if you like.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description: Informal classes without plan or program but a good opportunity to develop your conversational skills in Russian with a professional teacher ;)

pro_course_detail.title: In depth Russian course
pro_course_detail.description:
If you want to learn Russian in a more profound way, to understand how its grammar work, to focus on the pronunciation or other language aspects the course is for you.

I love teaching grammar and explain how it all works together. I use more academic approach in teaching here and give more details about the theory of the Russian language.

The course will be useful for professionals, for those who are learning or learnt Russian at the university or want to prepare for it. 

The lessons are also suitable for all language lovers who enjoy to talk about language structure and discover some truly interesting facts.

I will choose the material appropriate for your level and requirements.

pro_course_detail.title: Communicate in Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
The course is for those who need to start communicating in Russian or develop their speaking or writing skills as soon as possible.

If you need Russian to speak with the members of your family or friends, for your work or business partners, for travelling or some other specific situations you can choose this course.

I give here only the basic grammar that you might really need for your goal. We will concentrate on the essential vocabulary and phrases that are commonly used in the particular situations and there will be a lot of practice. 

If you feel overwhelmed with the amount of topics to study of cannot choose the right material to start with and progress fast enough this course is for you.

Speaking practice is the best way to start communicating in another language!

-> To improve all of your skills we will have a structured lesson. A relevant student's book will be a base. You'll receive homework. 

-> I'll model the lesson to be life oriented. We will also concentrate on the skill you want to strengthen or develop. You'll get to experience a real language training :)

Welcome! 

Important: I hold a class via Zoom.

pro_course_detail.title: German Specialized Course A2 - B1
pro_course_detail.description:
For students with at least A2 level

You prepare for work in a special field, for a trip or mission? 
 
Get some training that goes beyond students' books. I will help you to find the needed materials extra for your FIELD. 

The essential part of our lesson is that I will coach you how you can dive into language and speak it with confidence. How to acquire new vocabulary, as well as how to develop your listening and speaking skills in a new field.  

I provide you with the notes in Google Docs from each lesson, homework and needed technics. 

Welcome to a new path!

pro_course_detail.title: German Conversations A2 - B1
pro_course_detail.description:
For students with A2 level at least 

You get to practice both answering and asking (!)  questions. I may also provide corrections on pronunciation and grammar.
We'll have a conversation based on a video, an article or a song lyrics. 

Welcome! 

Important: The class is hold in Zoom.

pro_course_detail.title: Polish - Coaching Course
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for Russian speakers only. 

Курс для русскоязычных:
- с коммуникативным уровнем польского языка, либо
- с начальным уровнем польского, но владеющих белорусским либо украинским языком. 

Курс носит коучинговый характер. Значит, вы активно участвуете во всех стадиях обучения.  Ставите конкретную цель в отношении языка, берете ответственность за то, сколько работаете, выбираете, какие инструменты более эффективны для вас. Я во всем вам помогаю, направляю и поддерживаю. 

В начале 

На первом уроке курса мы вместе определяем интенсивность вашей работы с языком. 
В первую очередь, речь про самостоятельную работу. От меня вы получаете рекомендации по материалам. Вместе мы подбираем вам практики, с помощью которых вы сможете сделать иностранный язык частью вашей жизни, поддерживать и развивать свои навыки.  

Далее
Далее, на занятиях мы ведем спонтанные беседы по изученным вами темам (оформление документов в Польше, устройство на работу, поход к врачу и т.д.). Я даю обратную связь по вашей речи. Мы вместе анализируем и оцениваем вашу самостоятельную работу. У вас также есть возможность задать точечные вопросы по пройденному материалу.

Вы можете начать этот курс только после урока-знакомства (пробного урока), подав заявку на подходящий пакет по 45 или 60 мин. 

Если у вас появились вопросы, я открыта к диалогу. :)

teacher_info.intro:
Привет! 
Меня зовут Анна, я родилась в городе Ижевске, но сейчас живу в Санкт-Петербурге. Мои увлечения - это изучение английского языка, путешествия, кулинария, плавание, обожаю проводить время со своей семьей и друзьями.
teacher_info.about_me:
Привет! 
Меня зовут Анна, я родилась в городе Ижевске, но сейчас живу в Санкт-Петербурге. Мои увлечения - это изучение английского языка, путешествия, кулинария, плавание, обожаю проводить время со своей семьей и друзьями.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Как носитель языка, я с огромным удовольствием помогу в изучении русского языка. Имела опыт изучения английского языка в США, поэтому прекрасно понимаю как бывает сложно преодолеть стеснение и страх заговорить на иностранном для тебя языке. Поэтому буду стараться сделать так, чтобы мои уроки приносили только комфорт и легкость, а самое главное пользу.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Занятия будут проходить в качестве общения и обсуждения совместно выбранных тем и вопросов.  Подстроюсь под индивидуальные запросы и желания ученика, чтобы уроки были увлекательными и продуктивными.

course_info.trial_description:
Пробный урок - это знакомство, краткий рассказ о себе друг другу. Легкая разговорная практика.
During trial lesson we will get to know each other, tell short introduction about yourself. Having fun and speaking.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика/ Speaking practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Мы будем разговаривать на разные темы, которые интересны тебе! Если уровень языка - низкий, то мы можем практиковать базовые диалоги. 
Не стесняйся много говорить и задавать мне вопросы во время урока. Не бойся совершать ошибки в речи:)

We will talk about various topics that interest you! If the language level is low, then we can 
practice basic dialogues.
Feel free to talk a lot and ask me questions during a lesson.
Don't be afraid to make mistakes in your speech, I'll not beat you:)

pro_course_detail.title: ГРАММАТИКА/GRAMMAR
pro_course_detail.description: В зависимости от твоего уровня языка мы будем рассматривать вопросы грамматики через обычный диалог и конкретные примеры или с помощью выполнения упражнений на выбранные темы.  Выбирай тот способ, который будет комфортным для тебя.

teacher_info.intro:
IMPORTANT! I am pretty flexible with my schedule, so do NOT consider the presented on iTalki as my only available time, don't hesitate to contact me!

Graduated in Economics in Russia, I am currently doing my master degree in Rome, Italy. My passion is discovering the world: places, people, cultures. Learning languages is the key to broaden the horizons, that is why I love it and would like to help others to experience it.
teacher_info.about_me:
IMPORTANT! I am pretty flexible with my schedule, so do NOT consider the presented on iTalki as my only available time, don't hesitate to contact me!

Graduated in Economics in Russia, I am currently doing my master degree in Rome, Italy. My passion is discovering the world: places, people, cultures. Learning languages is the key to broaden the horizons, that is why I love it and would like to help others to experience it.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have 3 years of teaching experience. My main principal is that a student enjoys the class. Also, I would recommend to have a curtain goal for learning a language that keeps you having a wish to grow at a language. If you just have an interest for a language, I am here to let you try and find what inspires you. Patience and positive mood reflects me as a teacher.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
IMPORTANT! If a student does NOT show up at the scheduled class without prior notification within 15 minutes after start - the lesson is considered completed and paid.

ВАЖНО! Если студент не приходит на урок в течение 15 минут после начала без предупреждения заранее, урок считается проведённым и оплачивается.

The content of lessons depends on the level and request of a student. I prefer not to concentrate on one skill (ex. speaking/writing) but to mix all the competences to keep the student engaged and make a lesson dynamic and diverse. During the lesson we use different materials. Homework is optional and depends on the student's wish and needs.

course_info.trial_description: During the trial lesson we present ourselves and discuss goals of learning a language. Might be good if you have some preferences in the way of learning, if no - leave it to me:)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Beginners OR Advanced students
pro_course_detail.description:
The lessons are based on student's needs. 

For beginners I offer lessons which mostly are to raise/keep your interest in learning Russian. If you just started learning Russian, i would like to show you that it is possible to feel confident while speaking since the very beginning.

For advanced, I mostly offer conversation practice concentrating on the active vocabulary on various topics.

IMPORTANT: if you are at the levels of intermediate and want to go deeper in grammar, this type of lessons is NOT what you need. Unfortunately, I do not feel competent enough to teach you.

If you have any questions, please feel free to write me a message!:)

pro_course_detail.title: English for Russians (Английский для русскоговорящих)
pro_course_detail.description: Это урок для тех, чья цель - общение с носителем. Уроки с носителем английского приносят пользу только тогда, когда вы к ним готовы:) Правила грамматики и значение некоторой лексики зачастую проще понять, когда они преподаются на вашем родном языке (особенно взрослым). На данных уроках мы найдём, в чём ваши пробелы, и сделаем так, что использование грамматических конструкций перестанет быть проблемой, чтобы вы занимались с носителем с удовольствием, понимая что и почему вы говорите. Контакт потрясающего преподавателя-носителя предоставляется:)

pro_course_detail.title: English for Intermediates (all)
pro_course_detail.description: Conversation practice lesson for everybody who actually speaks English (from A2-B1). During this class we mainly focus on general understanding of English. The class might be useful if you want to practice with different people (from different places, with different accents).

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Pronunciation - Practice or Audio Recording
pro_course_detail.description:
This type of lesson is for those who would like to work on pronunciation in Russian (no grammar or vocabulary explained). There are 2 options:

1) 60 min lesson - we read a text together focusing on flow of speech, intonation, general pronunciation, aspects of pronunciation of certain words. After a lesson you get the audio of me reading the same text naturally for you to have possibility to practice by yourself later.

2) 30 min lesson - you ONLY GET THE AUDIO (20-30 min long) of me reading a text naturally and with pauses and pronunciation of certain words and constructions after the text with pauses and repeats. This is ONLY for PRACTICING BY YOURSELF. Excellent for Intermediate/Advanced.

general learning of Russian from 0 level to C2
learning Russian for traveling (a special, short course)
practicing speaking in Russian with accent reduction
public speaking
homework
writing
Russian exams at any level and subject including Russian history, literature and arts (my bachelor’s degree is in the arts)
I offer a personal plan for every student depending on the goals and interests of the student. The books, sites, and materials are chosen personally for your level, interests, and goals as well. I love languages and have learned several European and Asian languages, I deeply understand your challenge, to help you I improve my teaching skills every day and explain any material in a laconic and the easiest way possible.
My first master’s degree is in psychology, so I can help you with reducing  stress before exams, public speaking, and culture shock.

The Internet and a computer (for more in-depth study – a Russian keyboard)

Any other questions? Don’t hesitate to write me.

teacher_info.intro:
I was born and raised in Siberia. I now reside in New York and work at a university library. I specialize in working with Intermediate level and conversational Russian learners. My sessions can be structured or non-structured depending on your needs and preferences. I have plenty of ready to use PDFs on a variety of topics to help learners with vocabulary, grammar, reading and conversation skills. Expect some lesson notes and a light homework. 
I am a tad introverted which makes me a great listener. I am fluent in English and conversational in Spanish, but we will be using (basic) Russian most of the time. I also enjoy working with small groups of learners, so couples are welcome. Cheers!
teacher_info.about_me:
I was born and raised in Siberia. I now reside in New York and work at a university library. I specialize in working with Intermediate level and conversational Russian learners. My sessions can be structured or non-structured depending on your needs and preferences. I have plenty of ready to use PDFs on a variety of topics to help learners with vocabulary, grammar, reading and conversation skills. Expect some lesson notes and a light homework. 
I am a tad introverted which makes me a great listener. I am fluent in English and conversational in Spanish, but we will be using (basic) Russian most of the time. I also enjoy working with small groups of learners, so couples are welcome. Cheers!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I started teaching Russian at a local nonprofit several years ago to promote learning my native language and to help learners advance their speaking skills. I was delighted to see my students progress in conversational Russian, while having fun studying and practicing together. I gained some invaluable experience and a load of amazing teaching materials. 
They say I am a talented instructor, and I think they are right. I am friendly, flexible and encouraging. I try to engage my students and make them speak Russian feeling at ease. 
If you think I can help you, definitely book a trial with me. Let's have a chat and cover some of my lovely study/practice material, talk to you soon!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
We will have fun working on my materials! We oftentimes do not finish all the sections because we get too chatty, and it's totally fine since we practice Russian!
I start with some warm-up questions, then we proceed to the topic of the lesson. I share my screen and annotate, while working together. I write on screen what we say in Russian, so you could rely on text, if needed. 
My PDFs have sections with new vocabulary, an activity with images, a short reading, some fun exercises, and an opinion section with various questions on the topic. By the end of the lesson I assign you a light homework and send you our notes. 
Learning and speaking Russian can be so much fun, you will see!

course_info.trial_description: Hi, let's meet for a trial! Tell me 3 fun facts about yourself and 3 interesting things you know about the Russian language. I'll show you my awesome study/practice materials and provide feedback on your skills in Russian, as well as some notes with corrections and new vocabulary from the session. I am looking forward to meeting with you!

pro_course_detail.title: Study/Practice Session
pro_course_detail.description:
Dynamic and fun lessons with engaging study/practice materials for Intermediate level learners. The sessions run mostly in Russian, but I am used to conducting them in basic Russian as well, so no worries there! I am also fluent in English in case of any doubts in class.
I type on screen everything we say throughout the session, so you could rely on text if needed and take note of some corrections. Based on these notes, expect some feedback and homework.
We start with some small talk and get to the topic of the day. My interactive materials include sections on sharing ideas, vocabulary with images, practice exercises, a short text/dialogue, and opinion/experience questions on the topic. It'll be fun, looking forward to having you in class!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's meet to chat in Russian. I will have some questions for you and eagerly listen to your experiences, ideas, comments, complains, stories, and whatnot all in Russian! I am also fluent in English in case of any doubts in class.
I type on screen everything we say throughout the session, so you could rely on text if needed and take note of some corrections. Based on these notes, you can expect some feedback and homework. Looking forward to chatting with you!

teacher_info.intro:
Hi, there! My name is Bella and I ... am a teacher, obviously, but I'm also a language learner myself. I'm sure my professional and personal experience will be helpful to those who are on their way to become confident speakers. 
As for my qualifications, I hold a Bachelor degree in Linguistics with a focus in Teaching. Currently I work as a language tutor, at a language school and here on italki.
Apart from languages I enjoy travelling, programming, music, yoga, reading and spending time with my family!
teacher_info.short_signature: that very teacher who provides you with the most authentic learning experience
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi, there! My name is Bella and I ... am a teacher, obviously, but I'm also a language learner myself. I'm sure my professional and personal experience will be helpful to those who are on their way to become confident speakers. 
As for my qualifications, I hold a Bachelor degree in Linguistics with a focus in Teaching. Currently I work as a language tutor, at a language school and here on italki.
Apart from languages I enjoy travelling, programming, music, yoga, reading and spending time with my family!
teacher_info.about_teacher: The thing which makes my teaching helpful is that I pay attention not only to the lesson itself, but also to the preparation and follow-up tasks which you can receive as a homework assignment. This rule works even if you choose such kind of lesson as "Speaking practice". As I work as a teacher in everyday life too, not only on italki, I know how important it is to consider different aspects of methodology and language learning such as spaced repetition, teacher talking time, lexical approach and other.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I always strive to make every single lesson efficient, so that you really feel that you've learned something. In our classes we'll engage in all sorts of activities from watching Vox pops to discussing modern technological advances.
I always seek to indicate topics which give a hard time to my students. It is a challenge for me to help you understand something you weren't able to understand before. 
I try to dedicate equal amounts of time to all four aspects of language learning and, of course, strive to make it fun!

edu_info.major: Teaching English and German as foreign languages
edu_info.description: The main focus of the program was aimed at courses in methodology and teaching English and German as foreign languages. Other courses included liberal arts and linguistics.

course_info.trial_description: During the short 30-min lesson we'll first and foremost get to know each other! After that we usually discuss your learning objectives and do some tasks to help me assess your knowledge.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description: That's the one where we discuss topics which are usually chosen prior to the lesson. This lesson is mainly for your speaking skills, but we do occasionally focus on grammar, pronunciation, etc.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description: That's the one where we focus on all language aspects. Dedicating almost equal amounts of time to listening, writing, reading, and speaking, we'll manage to expand your knowledge.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English
pro_course_detail.description:
In this type of lesson we will discuss topics prepared in advance or anything off the top of your head. Depending on your preferences I can also prepare vocabulary lists to help you learn the topic a lot quicker. Documents in Word help you not forget any new words we've come across. 
Homework assignments are optional, however I always choose materials that will facilitate the learning process and help you review the classroom material but in a different way.

pro_course_detail.title: General English
pro_course_detail.description:
This type of lesson is thought out for those people who want to equally improve all aspects of their English. We work on your listening, reading, writing and speaking skills, at the same time we refine your grammar and vocabulary bank. And all of that is done in a very well-thought-out way.
Anyway, enough talking, I'm eager to see you in class! 
Homework is optional, however it will help you to immerse into the new material and will facilitate your learning process!
